auditor

Class Auditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • auditor.Auditor

  • public class Auditor
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an auditor for a process. Can store information regarding the setup, processing and results of a process and generate a file when complete.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.StringBuilder auditProcess
      Maintains the audit information for the main processing of information.
      private java.lang.StringBuilder auditResult
      Maintains the audit information for results of a process.
      private java.lang.StringBuilder auditSetup
      Maintains the audit information for setup of a process.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Auditor() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void auditProcess(java.lang.String audit)
      Stores audit information in audit's process.
      void auditResult(java.lang.String audit)
      Stores audit information in the audit's results.
      void auditSetup(java.lang.String audit)
      Stores audit information in the audit's setup.
      java.lang.String createAuditFile(java.lang.String name)
      Generates an audit file in the src directory named as "AUDIT_Timestamp".

      • createAuditFile

        public java.lang.String createAuditFile(java.lang.String name)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Generates an audit file in the src directory named as "AUDIT_Timestamp". This file contains separated audit setup, process and result information.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the output file
        Returns:
        the name of the file that was created
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
